scripts.build-kuzu: cd kuzu/tools/nodejs_api/ && npm i && cd ../.. && make nodejs NUM_THREADS=$(node -e "console.log(require('os').cpus().length)")
scripts.generate-grammar-prod: rm -rf src/utils/CypherParser/ && cp node_modules/kuzu/kuzu-source/src/antlr4/Cypher.g4 ./ && npx antlr4ng-cli -o src/utils/CypherParser -Dlanguage=TypeScript -no-visitor -no-listener Cypher.g4 && rm Cypher.g4 && cd src/utils/CypherParser && mv CypherParser.ts CypherParserOld.ts && grep -v "notify" CypherParserOld.ts > CypherParser.ts && rm CypherParserOld.ts
scripts.generate-grammar: rm -rf src/utils/CypherParser/ && cp kuzu/src/antlr4/Cypher.g4 ./ && npx antlr4ng-cli -o src/utils/CypherParser -Dlanguage=TypeScript -no-visitor -no-listener Cypher.g4 && rm Cypher.g4 && cd src/utils/CypherParser && mv CypherParser.ts CypherParserOld.ts && grep -v "notify" CypherParserOld.ts > CypherParser.ts && rm CypherParserOld.ts
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules dist datasets src/utils/CypherParser && git submodule deinit --all
